markdownRemark.html: Today I tried to figure out how to use some pretty icon to show my contact at footer. Then I found Font-awesome. It has a vast variety of useful website icons which is designed for Bootstrap. It is controlled by CSS that can create many amazing effects. It satifies all I need and make my site look nicer.

prev.html: I added a tooltip for my social links. I use jQuery to set the tooltip. jQuery is an amazing framework that make my work more efficient.
prev.excerpt: I added a tooltip for my social links. I use jQuery to set the tooltip. jQuery is an amazing framework that make my work more efficient.

next.html: Today I set up the music player and slide show modal for my blog. I generate the music player from Netease Music. It's very easy, you could create an external link from an album. For carousel, it's kinda complicated and challenging. But with the help of Jekyll tips, I did accomplish it at last. I think I should better understand the Jekyll and Liquid.
